医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的对比学习方法可以改善语音病理检测声音病理学是指由异常情况引起的问题，例如发声困难、瘫痪、囊肿，甚至癌症，导致声带（或声带）异常振动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/New-contrastive-learning-method-could-improve-voice-pathology-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/New-contrastive-learning-method-could-improve-voice-pathology-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d6c3f7d-7e0b-40cb-8370-4972ac67af9f Mon, 16 Oct 2023 22:10:31 -0400 New contrastive learning method could improve voice pathology detection
破解密码：鸡蛋消费和遗传学如何共同影响心脏病风险一项大型前瞻性研究表明，食用鸡蛋和遗传因素会协同增加冠状动脉疾病的风险。这些发现可能会为那些心脏病遗传风险较高的人制定个性化的饮食指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Cracking-the-code-How-egg-conspiration-and-genics-team-up-to-affect-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Cracking-the-code-How-egg-conspiration-and-genics-team-up-to-affect-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=099dc2d3-1b49-429e-b8f1-7e0b551f3f24 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 22:10:00 -0400 Cracking the code: How egg consumption and genetics team up to affect heart disease risk
桡动脉入路可能会彻底改变外周动脉介入治疗领域今天发表在《心血管造影与介入学会杂志》(JSCAI) 上的一项新研究探讨了使用桡动脉入路 (RA) 进行外周动脉介入治疗的安全性和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Radial-access-may-revolutionize-the-field-of-peripheral-artery-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Radial-access-may-revolutionize-the-field-of-peripheral-artery-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a401e2e-a9a8-4dcf-9d60-ba1bda6a553a Mon, 16 Oct 2023 21:59:38 -0400 Radial access may revolutionize the field of peripheral artery interventions
生物化学家揭示如何防止癌细胞对化疗产生耐药性RUDN 大学的生物化学家描述了如何防止癌细胞对化疗药物产生耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Biochemists-reveal-how-to-prevent-cancer-cells-from-becoming-pressive-to-chemotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Biochemists-reveal-how-to-prevent-cancer-cells-from-becoming-pressive-to-chemotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c51a6e6-6732-45e9-baba-ef5115beed21 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 21:50:06 -0400 Biochemists reveal how to prevent cancer cells from becoming resistant to chemotherapy
实验室培养的皮肤类器官帮助科学家了解猴痘感染皮肤类器官为持续对抗病毒（以前称为猴痘）的药物发现提供了强大的平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Lab-grown-skin-organoids-help-scientists-understand-monkeypox-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Lab-grown-skin-organoids-help-scientists-understand-monkeypox-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40b2a0bb-2b75-406e-a13d-7e96820c7930 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 21:43:37 -0400 Lab-grown skin organoids help scientists understand monkeypox infection
蝙蝠的基因蕴藏着增强免疫力和延长寿命的秘密蝙蝠在其进化过程中获得了显着的特征。它们是唯一会飞的哺乳动物，而且它们的寿命比其他同等体型的动物要长得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Bats-genes-hold-secrets-to-stronger-immunity-and-longer-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Bats-genes-hold-secrets-to-stronger-immunity-and-longer-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00c0d544-f1d1-4715-a74f-233d39b14c9b Mon, 16 Oct 2023 21:28:26 -0400 Bats' genes hold secrets to stronger immunity and longer life
培养力量：酸奶如何促进骨骼肌健康《营养素》中的这篇综合评论探讨了酸奶作为蛋白质来源的可能性，强调了与牛奶相比，酸奶对骨骼肌健康和消化率的有益影响。研究表明，酸奶不仅有助于肌肉蛋白质的合成，而且在减肥计划期间也有利于维持肌肉质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Cultivating-strength-How-yogurt-boosts-skeletal-muscle-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Cultivating-strength-How-yogurt-boosts-skeletal-muscle-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3df8c5d1-8816-4941-98fa-af86572295a5 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 21:15:00 -0400 Cultivating strength: How yogurt boosts skeletal muscle health
虚拟驾驶评估可以识别有风险的年轻驾驶员《儿科》杂志今天发表的新研究发现，在虚拟驾驶评估 (VDA) 上获得驾照时测量的驾驶技能可以让驾驶员接触常见的严重碰撞场景，有助于预测新获得驾照的年轻驾驶员的碰撞风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Virtual-driven-assessment-can-identify-at-risk-young-drivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Virtual-driven-assessment-can-identify-at-risk-young-drivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b71b9f19-0d4e-4c54-9aac-8fc984df9261 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 21:05:13 -0400 Virtual driving assessment can identify at-risk young drivers
肌酸和阻力训练可以降低你的体脂百分比吗？研究表明，阻力训练结合补充肌酸可有效降低 50 岁以下成年人的体脂百分比，且不影响绝对脂肪量。年龄、体重指数和运动频率等变量的研究结果是一致的，表明影响是一致的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Can-creatine-and-resistance-training-trim-your-body-fat-percentage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Can-creatine-and-resistance-training-trim-your-body-fat-percentage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de870ef5-bd4e-4393-985b-a3e1a1d8e044 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 20:57:00 -0400 Can creatine and resistance training trim your body fat percentage?
在这样做的同时保护环境并保护您的皮肤——“锦上添花”研究人员发现了一种可持续的方法来重新利用酸樱桃废物，利用其生物活性化合物用于皮肤护理应用。研究表明，这些提取物可显着保护人体皮肤细胞免受氧化应激，为食物垃圾和皮肤健康提供环保的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Save-the-environment-and-protect-your-skin-while-doing-it-e28093-the-cherry-on-top.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Save-the-environment-and-protect-your-skin-while-doing-it-e28093-the-cherry-on-top.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77774f08-3ab2-4ce6-8627-161f94491580 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 20:36:00 -0400 Save the environment and protect your skin while doing it – the 'cherry on top'
